name: Cyber Sphere
description:
Best player with four trackballs.

Made to be played in a public drop in/drop out setting, Cyber Sphere is a competitive arcade game for 2-4 players which uses trackballs as the primary method of control. Players race to capture and hold the Cyber Sphere, keeping it for as long as possible while evading other players to gain as many points as possible in 2 minutes.

Ciara Heraghty, Danuta Mangia, Erin Burns, Karen Bohlender, Robert Klivis, Ross Scott, Samuel Mcarthur-Mclean, Sam Stewart, Shaun Brown
